examples.example: 你们的友善和热情让人感到十分温暖。

translate.english: Your kindness and enthusiasm make people feel very warm.

examples.example: 你们的微笑如阳光般灿烂，温暖了整个世界。

translate.english: Your smiles are as bright as the sunshine and warm the whole world.

examples.example: 你们的积极乐观总是能感染身边的人，给大家带来动力。

translate.english: Your positive optimism can always infect the people around you and bring motivation to everyone.
